name: Hire Junior Developer
description: Guides the recruitment and onboarding process of a junior developer, with support for CV filtering, tests, multiple interview rounds, and onboarding.

steps.name: Define Job Requirements
steps.action: Specify skills, tools, responsibilities, and expectations

steps.name: Publish Job Offer
steps.action: Post offer on job boards, social media, and referrals

steps.name: Receive and Filter CVs
steps.action: Automatically or manually score and filter resumes

steps.name: Send Optional Pre-Screen Questions
steps.action: Send optional short form to check availability, interest, soft skills

steps.name: Schedule Technical Test
steps.action: Send coding task or technical screening to candidate

steps.name: Conduct Interview(s)
steps.action: Conduct 1â€“2 rounds of interviews (tech, HR, culture fit)

steps.name: Optional Internal Discussion
steps.action: HR and team discuss if candidate fits

steps.name: Send Offer Letter
steps.action: Send salary and start date offer to candidate

steps.name: Prepare Onboarding Plan
steps.action: Prepare tools, accesses, welcome materials, and mentor

steps.name: Start Onboarding Process
steps.action: Begin day 1 activities, environment setup, introductions
